title: Integration Strategy of Traditional Pharmacology Textbooks and Digital Platforms in Medical Education

context.additional_context: Basic medical education course for social sector vocational training, establishing a blended learning environment combining digital devices and textbooks

learning_goals: Learners can selectively utilize interactive digital tools and textbooks to explain core pharmacological concepts
Learners can apply visual materials from digital platforms in conjunction with in-depth theoretical knowledge from textbooks when analyzing clinical cases
Learners can establish and evaluate digital/textbook-based learning strategies tailored to their individual learning styles
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
